sentences.sentence: Her career occupies all of her time.
sentences.translation: 她的事业占用了她所有的时间。

sentences.sentence: Air not only occupies space but it also has weight.
sentences.translation: 空气不仅占据空间，而且它还具有重量。

sentences.sentence: Agriculture occupies an important place in the national economy.
sentences.translation: 农业在国民经济中占有重要地位。
